body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia            Social Media - connect with us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Flickr         Photo Gallery - browse historic images of Frederick Douglass, his family, and Cedar Hill           Virtual Museum Exhibit - see historic objects that belonged to Frederick Douglass and take a virtual tour of Cedar Hill           Multimedia Presentations - watch videos and listen to podcasts          Posters from National Park Service exhibits and educational programs about Frederick Douglass.
title: Frederick Douglass National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
